panels.description: Total CPU load ~ time spent (%) scheduling the guest

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_total_load") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_total_load") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_total_load") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_total_load") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_cpu" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: CPU - Total

panels.description: System CPU load ~ time spent (%) in kernel space (I/Os, device drivers, etc.)

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_system_load") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_system_load") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_system_load") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_system_load") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_cpu" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: CPU - System

panels.description: User CPU load ~ time spent (%) in user space (actual computation)

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_user_load") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_user_load") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_user_load") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_user_load") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_cpu" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: CPU - User

panels.description: Major memory faults (per second), requiring I/O (swap) activity

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_majflt_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_majflt_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_majflt_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_majflt_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_mem" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Memory - MajFlt

panels.description: Minor memory faults (per second), not requiring I/O (swap) activity

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_minflt_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_minflt_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_minflt_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_minflt_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_mem" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Memory - MinFlt

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_rss_bytes") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_rss_bytes") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_rss_bytes") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_rss_bytes") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_mem" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.description: Writes bytes (per second), actually written to swap memory

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_swap_writes_bytes_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_swap_writes_bytes_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_swap_writes_bytes_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_swap_writes_bytes_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_mem" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Swap - WR:throughput

panels.description: Reads bytes (per second), actually written to swap memory

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_swap_reads_bytes_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_swap_reads_bytes_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_swap_reads_bytes_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_swap_reads_bytes_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_mem" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Swap - RD:throughput

panels.description: Writes time spent waiting for virtual device to complete operations

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_writes_latency_seconds_per_op") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_writes_latency_seconds_per_op") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_writes_latency_seconds_per_op") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_writes_latency_seconds_per_op") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_io" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ AND "devid" =~ /^${DiskId}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Disk - WR:latency

panels.description: Writes bytes (per second), written to virtual device

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_writes_bytes_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_writes_bytes_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_writes_bytes_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_writes_bytes_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_io" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ AND "devid" =~ /^${DiskId}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Disk - WR:throughput

panels.description: Writes operations (per second), performed on virtual device

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_writes_ops_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_writes_ops_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_writes_ops_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_writes_ops_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_io" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ AND "devid" =~ /^${DiskId}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Disk - WR:iops

panels.description: Reads time spent waiting for virtual device to complete operations

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_reads_latency_seconds_per_op") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_reads_latency_seconds_per_op") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_reads_latency_seconds_per_op") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_reads_latency_seconds_per_op") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_io" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ AND "devid" =~ /^${DiskId}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Disk - RD:latency

panels.description: Reads bytes (per second), written to virtual device

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_reads_bytes_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_reads_bytes_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_reads_bytes_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_reads_bytes_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_io" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ AND "devid" =~ /^${DiskId}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Disk - RD:throughput

panels.description: Reads operations (per second), performed on virtual device

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_reads_ops_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_reads_ops_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_reads_ops_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_reads_ops_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_io" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ AND "devid" =~ /^${DiskId}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

panels.title: Disk - RD:iops

targets.query: SELECT MAX("MAX_tx_bytes_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_tx_bytes_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_tx_bytes_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_tx_bytes_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_net" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ AND "devid" =~ /^${IFaceId}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

SELECT MAX("MAX_rx_bytes_per_second") AS "MAX", MEAN("MEAN_rx_bytes_per_second") AS "Mean", MEAN("MEDIAN_rx_bytes_per_second") AS "Median", MIN("MIN_rx_bytes_per_second") AS "MIN" FROM "history"."virt_net" WHERE ${timeFilter} AND "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/ AND "devid" =~ /^${IFaceId}$/ GROUP BY time(${__interval})

list.name: Guest
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "history"."virt_cpu" WITH KEY = "guest"

list.name: DiskId
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "history"."virt_io" WITH KEY = "devid" WHERE "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/

list.name: IFaceId
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "history"."virt_net" WITH KEY = "devid" WHERE "guest" =~ /^${Guest}$/
